website_summaries.verdict: Basic, tabletop-only design makes it great for those who don't want an easel taking up a lot of space while out or stored.
pros: Big drawer with compartments helps keep supplies organized and stored away
Lightweight design folds up small for portability and storage
Great for a beginner or those with smaller spaces
cons: Made out of unfinished wood, so it's a bit rough around the edges
No option to use as a standing easel

customer_reviews.title: This thing is beautiful, and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beautiful, and inexpensive. It will not budge when your working on it, since it has four little rubber feet at each corner. Inside it has a fair amount of space to keep your brushes or paints in. The 11-Inch-by-14-Inch canvas fits perfectly on it. The picture can be misleading as it appears to have a stain and a coat of poly or protectant on it. The one I received did not.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk/easel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It works for my budget and the size of the drawer is great for the brushes and the tiny tubes of paint I got. (It would hold larger sizes, though.) It's easy to set up. The drawer did not stick. The whole thing worked perfectly. You might want to put it on the table (I sit on the floor when I paint) because it is small. I noticed someone asked a question about the lowest angle of the easel. I saw nowhere to upload a picture for that person, and this offers me the option, so I am posting four pictures I took a few minutes ago, showing each angle for those interested.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B

customer_reviews.title: Personal Portable Easy Easel
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully made small Easel. The easel and the drawer have individual locks holding them in place when it is collapsed. The tilt portion has four different level adjustments which is great for individual choices. A nice drawer with 3 sections and a flat wooden palette. A nice flat laying handle finishing this light weight personal easel. I love to paint, I have been attending the painting for fun groups and wanted to do more on my own at home. This is the perfect size for me, since I don't have room for a full size easel. Since it is portable I can take it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Cris D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iPad Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Great desktop easel for sketching and painting on my iPad Pro. The draw holds the Apple Pencil. The multiple angle adjustment settings are just right.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. It is so easy to use and it is a good quality. Also quick delivery. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Iwona

customer_reviews.title: Junk don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk- screws came off after first use by a gentle 8yr old. Won't stand at all. We screwed it down again and they came off again immediately with me using it😡 Woodis soft and does not hold screws. Was a gift for my son so had gone past return time. Junk junk junk don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: DocSpingjasmine

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of all 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: As I previously reviewed on light pad, my son does government intel work. I surprised him with a selection of art tools to assist in his presentations. This adjustable desk was part of the surprise pkg. He said this is the best surprise box I have ever sent. He said he wanted something like this for a long time just never got around to buying it. I have not seen it except on the computer but my son says it is very well made and suits all his needs. He was full of praises. Based on his opinion, which is reliable, I would say buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: geina creviston

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Unfinished wood but will do. Water spilled on it but dried up fast. Find the latches before yuan open the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The easel was great - except the hinge was basically broken upon delivery, thus the easel part could not be confidently raised into position. My five star rating reflects both the satisfaction experience dealing with customer service and the easel itself. Dealing with Art Alternatives was an extreme pleasure. Upon giving them my Amazon order # and a picture of the issue, they immediately offered to replace at no charge and with no shipping issues. The customer service rep I spoke with was understanding and kind. I've dealt with very poor 3rd party Amazon companies. Very glad to say Art Alternatives is one of the good ones. Would gladly purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Some design flaws, but it's cheap so what do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: This is really rinky dink. It arrived with the latch already fallen off but it was still usable so I just kept it. The easel is a pain in the butt if the medium you're painting on is thin so I definitely do not recommend this if you like to paint on canvas board/panels or papers. However, for gallery wrapped canvas it works fine. =) Maybe a good table top easel for someone totally new to painting provided you also supply them with the gallery wrapped canvases. Otherwise this is going to drive someone bonkers everytime they have to pull their painting out of the opening between the back and bottom of the easel.
customer_reviews.author: A.S. Byron

customer_reviews.title: A winner gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a real handy little gift for a child or even an adult I think. I had gotten it for Grandchildren and very happy with it. Grandchildren loved the area for storing supplies and extra palett inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes, you really do get what you pay for. .
customer_reviews.text: So, I'll include pics but really. .this should be listed as a miniature desk easel, Amazon should also stop blending reviews for similar products causing some of this confusion as well. I go by reviews and the pics I saw seemed to indicate full size products could fit- only a few however. I can't close the drawer.I'll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Nichols Britt

customer_reviews.title: Pictures this so cute
customer_reviews.text: It is very light. The drawer is very small my paint brushes did not fit well so I tried my sketching supplies. As you can see they fit much better. The hinges and handles light weight so may not do well with a lot of handling. I purchased a similar product that has better hardware on it. If you want to use it for a larger project I also used a thin piece of siding that worked great. To cute to return. Think I'll keep it. It arrived really quick. Boxed well.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy at an unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy at an unbelievable price. I ordered it on Tuesday and received it Thursday (today) morning. It came assembled and ready to use. It's lightweight. Full of space to add the pencils, paints, and brushes I use the most. It's perfect for sketching or painting. I love it! I would recommend you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws but very usable and the price is great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this portable easel, the idea is brillant. I wish the easel back was larger, only holds small boards or canvases. I also wished it had the capacity to hold the painting surface more upright, leans the board back too far making the artist having to lean over instead of having the back straight. The groves on the board that props the easel need to be a little deeper, making it harder for the easel to fall backward easily. Despite this I am using it as a holder, it is not big and can easily be used anywhere, is VERY portable, and love the storage drawers. A great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Donna F. Mize

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feels like it was made to be covered in paint or ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too shabby for $15! It's got a balsa-wood texture (light, unfinished wood), but it's actually quite a bit sturdier than it seems. Definitely feels like it was made to be covered in paint or stickers, haha. The stand hold up fine when I stuck my full sketchpad on it and didn't feel wobbly while I worked. The latches to hold the drawer and easel in place feel solid enough. The drawer itself fits quite a few drawing tools, but don't expect to put all your paint tubes in it. Overall I'm pretty happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepsteaks

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my little paintings. I don't do anything professionally or anything like that but for my fun hobby it works great! i like to just paint in bed like the lazy gen z i am so this is nice to have while laying down. I got this item on sale, I probably wouldn't have paid full price but for $15 it's absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Seems good enough
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur acrylic painter who has hardly used this easel for that purpose, but I've propped a relatively heavy clipboard with a notepad inside it up on it at a pretty steep angle many times and it's worked out fine. I'm sure, of course, that if you are a highly advanced abstract painter or something prone to rigorously striking color onto the canvas/paper in a blind frenzy of ultra-inspired artistic bliss, this surely won't be sturdy enough for you, and it is of course small. But I think it's a fantastic painting easel for children and beginners, maybe even a professional whose work is of a nature suited to the products advantages and boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. Slapped some cherry wood stain on it and turned out fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: What a Brilliant little box this is! I recieved it in 2 days, thank you Amazon. The box is well designed and tacked up well. All the hardware is aligned, nothing missing, drawer works fine, I even see signs of glue use during assembly. So far I find the reviews that addressed the above items with noted defects to be inaccurate for my item. I really like this box easle, the size is 10 inches by 13 inches and it is perfict for table, desk, floor or lap. I have made a great purchase and I will buy a second one for my child at a great price from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bryne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and I like the varying angles option, as well as the drawer. Works well for canvas up to 11x14. Our first time using it we wanted to do a wood pallet board that was 26" long/tall. The easel could handle it horizontally, but we could not stand the board vertically because it was too top-heavy and wanted to slide, so that was our only disappointment since we purchased it specifically to do a painting class that was a vertical picture.
customer_reviews.author: HSMomof3

customer_reviews.title: I liked it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome for about a month. Used it while I was in an oil painting class to paint at home. After a month or so of use though, it broke when i was opening it. Was pretty disappointed cause I was really digging this thing. Maybe still worth a buy if you're really careful with it?
customer_reviews.author: mike cooksy

customer_reviews.title: perfect easel and textbook stand!!
customer_reviews.text: This easel is perfect!! It comes with a pull out drawer, adjustable stand, and color palette. I'm using it as a textbook stand (after reading some of the other reviewers' suggestions) but it would also be great for painting! You can stick pens highlighters etc in the drawer and it has a handle on the side making it easy to carry and set up.
customer_reviews.author: A Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Great but could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is very practical especially when you lack space. What I did not like is that this does not do well when painting on a piece of paper without a backboard. I purchased this for my children to use when they paint but the back is not solid and there is also nothing to hold the paper. It does better if you have paper within a book, we have loose leaf paint paper. Otherwise, it’s priced very good and so far very sturdy. We have two for almost a month. I got cardboard and a binder clip to make it work better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not to be on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, bad material, drawer is not opening, loose screws that slept already!! Bad package. I'm lazy to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product just a few times I give 5 points but this is something that you need to have if you love to paint
customer_reviews.author: mara

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is good value, cheaper then buying in the store. Does not hold 16x20 canvas. Good for anything smaller. It does have non sliding pads on the bottomed that are good sometimes (might be removing those). I do a lot of work on canvas panels and it does great for those so I can easily rotate the panel while I paint or use pens. Canvas I find myself wanting to rotate the unit. The ability to adjust the easel is nice and it does stay in place even when I lean into it when using pens and stencils. I would recommend this for small work.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: The easel is very well made, and nicely finished. The hinges and latches are made of a nice brass colored material and work well. The easel angle is adjustable is steps, and I can always find an angle that works well for me. The little drawer works smoothly and has little dividers that make it handy for my tubes of paint and brushes. As an extra bonus, it works well as a music stand for practicing recorder playing.
customer_reviews.author: Taranome

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, have it as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a gift. It's nice and easy to fold. Great price. I've been doing art for 30 years, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and is portable, but craftmanship may need your attention.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice and it is portable. But please examine carefully the manufacturing craftmanship, to prevent probles in future use. Your item may need some additional staples to put in it, or screws fixed in the holes with a drops of something like Gorilla-Glue on a cotton small balls inserted in corresponding holes. The wood is unfinished, and may need some paint.
customer_reviews.author: Wladis

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this, it's very light and so portable
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this, it's very light and so portable! It also just looks cute, so that's a plus! My only beef with it is that the drawer is just a dash too small to carry many meaningful supplies. I kind of wish they had made something a bit deeper; the item is so light that the extra dimension wouldn't be at all cumbersome. Anyway, if you have very small supplies, this is perfect for taking around to get creative on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: great portability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take to a painting class. It was a big hit with other students. It's compact, light weight, and sturdy. It probably will not work well for a canvas larger than 11 x 14. The only negative is that there is limited drawer space for supplies. However, this is not an issue for me. It really is a great value for the price...which was less than $15.00.
customer_reviews.author: albie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, everything works
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, I have yet to use this. I bought it hoping to get the creative juices flowing. Due to no fault of it’s own, that has yet to occur and there it sits glaring at me daily, unused. However, I’m not sorry I bought it. It looks, feels and functions exactly as described and is an excellent deal! Clean, simple, no disappointing surprises. I tried laying a bound watercolor book (9x12) across and it flopped but a clip would settle that I think. Drawer works fine, love the angles, takes pressure, and has a nice handle. I’ll eventually stop staring at it and put it to work. When I do I expect to be rather pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Nick’sNickelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Take a pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I opened this up expecting to spend a rainy relaxing afternoon painting. What a piece of s*^t. The screws aren't holding anything in place. I actually pounded my hands on the table out of frustration so the relaxation results went down the toilet. I'd return it except I think it may be too late!
customer_reviews.author: Gina F.

customer_reviews.title: This product is trash! Wish I didn't buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: AT first I was excited to use this product. After unpacking and organizing all my art supplies within the drawer I have come to realize that I cannot get it to re-open! When things shift within the compartments the drawer locks up. I have been struggling to open it so eventually I had to go at it with a hammer and wound up destroying it just to get my art supplies out!! Cheaply made and very dissatisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: It's the size I need, but it is very cheaply made. The latch to close the unit was bent and broke off when trying to close. My first drawing the anchor piece that adjust the levels broke. I should have known better when I seen the price. I used wood glue to reinforce the remaining brackets and hope I'm able to find a replacement for the main closure. Not a happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches5712

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Used daily for almost a year. Holding up nicely. Can hold much larger sizes than you would expect with a little tape wrapped from the mounting board to the underside of the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small children’s toy
customer_reviews.text: This products longest dimension is 11” - far smaller than listed. It’s incredibly cheap, flimsy with no sturdiness for pressure applied to the easel. A child’s toy at best but not practical for actual use. Found the perfect tabletop easel at Michaels for 35$ to replace this piece of crap. Shop around!
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Diamond Painting!
customer_reviews.text: I use this easel for diamond painting and it has worked well for my smaller projects. If you work on diamond paintings that are larger than 30x40cm I would definitely purchase a larger sized easel. My 30x40cm project hangs of the sides a bit but its manageable; I may invest in a larger sized easel in the future. This easel holds an A4 light pad perfectly! I love the drawer and use it for my tools. By adding this product to my set-up I no longer have neck pain when I work and it makes crafting so much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: brittmichele

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. I like that it fits on my T.V. try and it seems to be sturdy enough. I saw on previous reviews that the tray didn't hold much, and they were correct as you can see in my picture. Over all I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Leets62

customer_reviews.title: Wow was I wrong
customer_reviews.text: To be truthful I was expecting this to be of much less quality considering the low cost. I was pleased to see that the whole thing is of vary high quality. Well worth the price. Except for the inside of the drawer the surface is a bit shiny witch suggests a polyurethane coat. For me the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: It looks good is well made
customer_reviews.text: But it's heavy when you are loading all materials to art class I tend to leave this behind and use at home occasionally. Nicely made though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this easel! Small & portable
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect because of the price. Pretty sturdy. I really like this easel! It's very portable since it has latches to hold everything in place. Its bare wood so you can paint or stain it. No splinters! The drawer is on the small size but you can still fit things in there. I would definitely recommend this easel
customer_reviews.author: Carrma

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Screws on hinge came out. Height is too short to hold a canvas. It hits on the canvas where you are trying to paint. Maybe good for canvas under 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Art Easel
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her easel. I just wish it was a little wider. It was hard to find one in the right size. They were either too big or this size. But she still loved it and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great little easel. Small that what I expected but still does the job. It does have little locks on the side to hold the desk drawer in and so the top can lay flat. Arrived on time and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lecuyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! You can store items for easy access. I have my knife set in the drawer. The drawer and the easel lock on the sides for easy storage or transportation. It also has a carrying handle which I wouldn't use. Great for a desk or short table. You can adjust the angle of your painting with the wooden latch on the back. Having a chair with an adjustable height helps since you cannot adjust the height beyond what your desk is set at. You could use books or a box underneath, but it wouldn't be as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: V Roze

customer_reviews.title: Package damaged when arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Tho package came in all wrapped up in paper. No box or foam wrap to keep it safe. Opened the package and the screws were already falling off, the wood was cracked so it couldn’t stand up. Overall weak material, was in crap condition. Do not buy this. Wasted $40 on this piece of junk. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with it. It changed everything for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got lucky with this one, I love it to death and I was very surprised how it fit my 14 x 17 CANSON XL media pad. Photos for size comparison. My smallest notebook is 9 x 10 I would buy it again even if mine broke. It’s really neat and it’s a steal for the price
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so cool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend because the is always doing some sort of arty-crafty project of some sort. I saw this on amazon and thought it was awesome! its a workstation with storage and a little paint palette at a reasonable price! it may not be up to the standards of a professional artist but it works great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Handy easel or cookbook stand, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the bad reviews on here were expecting. It's a 13 dollar basic pine table easel. The latches work just fine (and it'd be an easy fix if they didn't) and the drawer opens easily if you unlatch it and take out the included palette. Having the drawer in the front is much more useful than the many I saw with a drawer in the back (what good does that do you?). Makes a great easel, cookbook stand, or iPad stand.
customer_reviews.author: FrejaFolkvangar

customer_reviews.title: Light and versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning art novice. I got this so I could practice drawing at a desk and on the couch. It’s light and easy to use!!! The drawer gets very stuck often. But I don’t use it a lot so I haven’t minded it. I definitely got my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Wish the easel part was taller
customer_reviews.text: If I use 11x14 canvas (or larger) to paint on, the easel part is not big enough to fully support the canvas. Smaller canvas it works well for. Nice drawer to hold my brushes when I'm not using them, but it's not big enough to hold the bottles of acrylic paint I am using.
customer_reviews.author: N. Little

customer_reviews.title: Versatile little easel
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little easel! I've used this for holding canvases, drawing boards, and even my small graphics monitor. It's put up with quite a bit of abuse and weight from being drawn/painted on and has yet to buckle. The drawer holds far more than I expected, though I do tend to only keep small brushes and water pens inside, rather than any actual paints or other bulkier materials.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Slick little easel!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is an amazing little easel. It is quite sturdy and yet easily portable. It holds my sketchbook (a 9" x 12" thick Strathmore) beautifully with room to spare. It also features four positions for drawing, painting, and viewing. The drawer at the easel's front is another big plus, and it can be locked for transporting materials. I don't suppose a professional artist would use it, but for an amateur artist like me, it's perfect! It comes out of the box ready to use. I am pleased by both the cost and the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tabletop Easel
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 y/o daughter for x-mas who is showing an interest in painting. I was a little nervous because the price seemed so low compared to others I've seen. I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It is well made and pretty sturdy. I love how it closes and folds up. The drawer sticks a little bit but it's not a huge deal. Best of all, she loves it and uses it a lot. I would recommend this for both kids and adults who are looking for a smaller easel. You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Marie Bosket

customer_reviews.title: Great for painting or books!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as it was pictured. Gorgeous wood - almost looks hand-crafted. There is a kind of "kickstand apparatus in the back that allow you to station your painting or even a book at the exact angle you wish. The drawer is brilliant and convenient with three compartments and can hold paintbrushes & small paint containers. The palette is wood as well. Once you use the palette, you'll find it difficult to remove the paint, however. That could cause problems if you plan to use the board again. I love the side handle that makes carrying this easle easy & stylish. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jofi00Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: They should use piano hinges to hold better.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Wood is very light weight. At first use, hinge that allows board to go up and down broke off. Unable to screw back in due to screws striping wood. May have to try and super glue. Undecided if it's worth my time to send back.
customer_reviews.author: G Silver

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Set! Quality control is a bit lacking...
customer_reviews.text: This was a cheap, convenient, easy way for me to start painting at home after 20 years off...It's a nice, simple set. It was missing two screws, one that I found; the other was missing and would not have worked since the hole that was made for it was too close to the edge of the wood. The bracket to close the drawer is loose, therefore, but the set was still worth the low price, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: noevilstar74

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item. Good craftsmanship and very functional. This little easel specifies that certain sizes of work function best, and that is true, but larger sizes also work well. The item is unfinished but that is not problem, with use the oils from our hands tend to bring up a glowing patina that no finish can improve upon. This item is available from Amazon through another supplier for a dollar or so less, but that is only a nit. The is a very good item with exceptional value, for a terrific table easel, portable and economical, I can't imagine a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son is still using this regularly a year later. It's a very simple design but it's good quality and it's never been an issue for him to use on his own. He really appreciates the slot for his brushes and some colors as makes transporting everything very easy. So glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: H&J Mads

customer_reviews.title: Storage drawer is a little small. Please read.
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently laid up for about 2 months due to a dislocation of my foot and surgery. So I thought some paint by numbers would be fun. When I saw this...I thought this would be perfect to lay on my lap and prop up the picture so I can paint as I'm laying down. Added bonus? Cute little drawer to store the paints and paintbrushes. Sadly, the paints are too large. And I have 3 different paint by numbers and none of them fit in the drawer. I would still buy this. It's working great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JennJennRN

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: I bought six of these to use for painting parties. They are sturdy and attractive. The girls from the first party liked them so much they asked for the link so they could buy them for themselves.... I'm not sure if it's ideal for people who paint frequently and you can't fit large canvases on it, but I already have a drafting desk (and a full time job that leaves me with little painting time), so these work perfectly for the purpose I intended them for but may not be the best option for others.
customer_reviews.author: andys girl

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one place
customer_reviews.text: It's small, compact and keep everything organized. I still have trouble finding which way is the little drawer since the locks are on the side, but honestly its great. great for gifts, it feels expensive since its wood. came fast and protected.
customer_reviews.author: nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, both broken hinges, very low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy junk, I liked the idea of it, however, the hinges are so bendy and crummily made. I ordered two (one for myself and one for my son) and both were broken. Both of them arrived with faulty bendy hinges and one was split down the side of the wood so I returned that one, and didn't get a full refund as I had to pay for shipping. I was going to order this as a gift but it's too junky, I am going to try and find something else that is better quality, it's worth spending a bit more for quality instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Anon

customer_reviews.title: Well-built product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece as a Christmas present and she absolutely loves it. It's a great price for the product that you got its well-built and makes it easy for kids with a passion for art 2 make their masterpieces. My niece uses this pretty much daily and she loves it so if you have an artist in the family then this is a great gift and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable artist desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable artist's desk. It's fun, easy to use, set up & work with. The only addition to this marvelous desk (which would make it absolutely perfect) is the addition of some (built in or in addition to) the supplied pallet would be something to hold single papers on or a light weight pad because the wind can just ruin everything if u forget to bring tape!
customer_reviews.author: Dee100

customer_reviews.title: I seen the reviews before buying and they were pretty good so went ahead and got it
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this. I seen the reviews before buying and they were pretty good so went ahead and got it. It's smaller then I thought and will not hold a very big canvas, the first time using it, it started falling apart, and there is nothing on the little ledge that you sit the canvas on to keep it from slipping out from under you. I would send back but needed it so I modified it so the canvas would stay on. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: cody l.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price; Has Multi-Uses, too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product for the low cost. I'm disabled and spend ALOT of time propped up on pillows in bed. This desk also can be used to prop up books I'm reading-not so good for paperbacks, but OK for hard cover books. The little drawer is nice to store a few pens. And it's small enough to easily fit in its box under my bed-we don't have much storage space. The reason I gave it 4, instead of 5 stars, is because it IS light weight and probably won't hold up well with long, intensive use. It's a great starter product.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this same easel TWICE and both times the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same easel TWICE and both times the latch to shut the drawer wouldn't shut. I even sent the seller pics of the latch and how UNEVEN the drawer and easel were. This SECOND easel had the SAME problem, but I figured it was more trouble than it was worth to return AGAIN, so I'm stuck w/ an easel w/ a drawer that doesn't close. A real bummer because the drawer is essential for storing brushes, palette, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MC_2424

customer_reviews.title: Great little easel!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I read that other customers found it splintery, and I was prepared to sand down any rough edges when I opened it, but I ran my fingers all around and found no splintery edges at all. The latches all lined up perfectly, and I can keep my paints and brushes in the tiny drawer when I'm not painting. Perfect for small paint-by-numbers. It came with a nice small palette, too, for mixing paints. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I almost cancelled it from order when I was ordering a bunch of pain by number stuff but I'm so glad I didn't! I can literally sit anywhere from the table, to the couch to even my bed and paint using this product. Its very sturdy you can tell it's well built. And also a great price! Also travels well. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to triying Plein Air before investing big.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very nice for walk-ins over distance. Light weight but great size for holding on lap. The drawer depth is shallow for the common 37 mm paint tubes but those made for thumb box types are available. I added same size box that was glued and screwed to bottom. Can carry four 9x12 panels. A cigar box will carry paints rag, medium etc. Amazon also sells a great folding chair and camp table that is light weight and would be useful if you don't want to sit in the snow and mud.
customer_reviews.author: David George

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 20 stars. It is that amazing. I like using it for painting/drawing but also it is great as a lap desk for a book or Ipad. I recommended this to my graduate school adviser and she is considering getting these for the art class she teaches!! It is portable, the little drawer is just too cute and can be adjusted for one's needs. Plus the price is quite reasonable. Recommend, recommend, recommend!! The only possible drawback is that the drawer can get stuck and only brushes or smaller items will fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I've been delving into painting in an attempt to learn and grow, so I needed a decent, not-too-expensive easle. Originally I was looking for a floor easle, but decided on this because it looked more attractive. I use it on my laptop desk and it serves its purpose well. It's built sturdily and has a convenient drawer with sections I can put my brushes and other things in. Its also got a handle and two clasps, one for the drawer and one to keep the easle flat. I really like it the bare wood look because I don't feel guilty about getting paint on it, and instead feel it makes it look more artistic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it. It’s light weight and easy to carry. It’s also nice it has a drawer for brushes and supplies. The drawer is not deep but sufficient for brushes and a few other supplies. It’s nice you can adjust the angle too
customer_reviews.author: mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: Compact desktop easel, perfect for watercolor.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desktop easel for my watercolors. It probably wont work for plein air, but it is perfect for what I wanted. It is unfinished wood, so I may give it a coat of varnish to keep it conditioned. But the construction is sturdy and the latches keep everything neatly contained. The easel adjusts to three different angles to control the flow. With the proper tripod and mounting hardware, I may be able to adapt if for plein air, but I haven't figured that out yet.
customer_reviews.author: MySquareFeet

customer_reviews.title: Really good small easel
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy. I usually paint with the surface laying on the floor. This can get uncomfortable. This tiny easel is easy to set on any flat surface, making it easier to work on small paintings wherever I want to sit. It's very lightweight, and adjusts easily enough. You could knock it down/out of place without much effort but that doesn't really cause any issues for me. I was surprised I could fit so much in the drawer. I can get pretty much all of the paint tubes I want, brushes, and a few small items in there along with the pallete (which I cover so that it doesn't get caked with paint). Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: My teen loves it. One of her most used Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: Really great size and nice quality materials. Works great sitting up on the bed or couch. My daughter has used various size canvases and paper with ease. It's really well made and very handy. The storage drawer holds much more than anticipated. May order more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: kbbels

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but needs some improvement !
customer_reviews.text: Quality of wood and design is good. Hinges are too small to hold the weight if a board is added. I doubt it's support will last for long time. Price is good though. It's new purchase, so yet to see the durability.
customer_reviews.author: asap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've been painting at my kitchen table, or my sun porch, or my bedroom desk. What I'm getting at here is I needed something portable and this fits my needs perfectly. Mine came in great condition and I'm loving it. I wouldn't use this for anything bigger than maybe 9x12 though. I'm thrilled that it fits perfectly in the bottom of my little art cart, I was worried it might not fit.
customer_reviews.author: MamaKat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful...I was amazed at all the things that came with it...inside the drawer is a compartment for paintbrushes and paint and it comes with a paint board...it is already assembled; which is a huge plus..hinges in the right places and a leather strap for easy carrying...I am very happy with this purchase...time to paint...:D
customer_reviews.author: Ruthanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this ... everything about it. It's been one of those purchases that make me say to myself "I'm so glad I got this!" each time I use it. For $13 it's a no-brainer if you need a portable way to set up a quick drawing session, with all of your pencils and other tools at your finger tips in the little pull-out drawer in front. When you're finished, and close up the easel and close the drawer and secure each with the little lock latches for each -- place your drawing tablet on top and slip into a drawer. Perfect. $13!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sue

customer_reviews.title: For pencil/charcoal work it is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best art purchase I have made. I am not an artist, but I am taking an art course. I tried using an art easel. Those work best for me with paints. For practice pencil drawings, this little desk is perfect. It holds my drawing material at the right tilt, and a drawer for pencils and most important erasers. I am not searching for where I had them last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I use it to paint in my living room (small apartment lol) it sits nicely and doesn’t move unless you like, really push it. Storage is nice for my brushes and a few essentials. It locks nicely for storage. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CassBradley17

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, only had for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Broken in just 2 weeks. I didn't even take it anywhere, just kept in my apt. No excessive force. Just folded it up last night then opened it just now- the little screws have come out.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: After a recent car accident, I asked my chiropractor what I could do about my pain when looking down. He advised me to not look down. As an English teacher, I need to look down to grade my papers, to read, and generally do the majority of measurable tasks while at work, so not looking down was really not an option. I compromised by ordering this desk easel. It allowed me to do most of my work without causing myself undue pain. I expect that I will continue to use it even after my neck is healed, since looking forward is more ergonomic than looking down for prolonged periods.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wisecup

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable desktop sized easel that I could put my wacom and ipad or an occasional sketch pad on. This easel hit all the right marks for my requirements. The easel doesn't take up that much space, is plenty sturdy and has a handy compact storage compartment that I was not expecting. In my opinion it is a real quality find with a very affordable price. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Green

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to go to Michaels to buy few easels for my daughters until I saw this amazing product on Amazon, less than half the price than Michaels and an excellent, sturdy quality, really ease to fold, portable, practical. What a great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLARA G.

customer_reviews.title: Well made! Happy college Art student!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I don’t have much space where I live right now. So the size works great. Made of actual wood too. The clasps and handle is a great touch to add quality and functionality. Fits my 11x14 stretch book well. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and handy.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this easel nearly every day for the last 4 weeks; for figure drawing classes (perching it on my lap) and drawing class homework (perched on my table). I brought it with me on vacation, tucked inside my suitcase. I think it is a great little device BUT the metal hardware is very flimsy, and the wood is soft. I replaced the hinges with sturdier ones, including bigger screws. I anticipate having to replace the hooks and latch before too long. A piece of wood is cracked, and I may have to glue and staple it together if it cracks more. Hard to beat at this price, and I'm happy I've been able to fix the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fox

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable in Height for Water Color Painting
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it had a slightly deeper drawer and a latch to secure the drawer to the frame. It works for thin tubes of paint but some of the slightly thicker brands do not fit very well in the drawer. The drawer tends to slide completely out of the slot for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lapis Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good table top easel
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old wanted an easel to take places and this works great. Only problem is it can be a little difficult to slide back into place after you’re done using it. Overall a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hermilton11Top Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty small but it holds them in place
customer_reviews.text: I use these for the paint by number kits I buy. It's pretty small but it holds them in place. I can't say I'd recommend it do anyone that does painting that requires a firm stroke but for what I got it for, it's perfect. The drawer can fit those small connected plastic tubs of acrylic paint and a few brushes. If you have a Bob Ross style setup, this probably won't work for you. But I like that I can close it up and put it away. It fits on a TV tray so I can paint wherever in my home. For reference, the backing is only slightly larger than an average piece of paper.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it is wood because it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. I like the fact that it is wood because it looks and smells good. I wanted it to hold music sheets so I removed the tray dividers which were solidly installed with glue and end nails. If you want to keep them I can say you should never have a problem with them falling out. My wife could still use it for her craft work if she needed it. The price is reasonable and I would recommend it. What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Henry B. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help with the backache I get when coloring. I am not a pro, just someone who likes to color for stress relief or just to pass the time. I use it on my lap when I'm on the sofa, therefore the drawer is useless to me, but it is nice having a ledge to put a few pencils on while working. The drawer would work if it were on a table top. It is a little small, but it is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: azbeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great little easel
customer_reviews.text: This little easel is great! It's sturdy and stays in place on the table. Great price too. The drawer isn't very useful to me, but it adds weight to the easel so that it can't be easily knocked over. The edge of the easel that the canvas sits on will get a lot of paint on it if you aren't super careful. I've started covering it with a piece of foil so that I don't have to put the easel away with wet paint on it. This keeps the whole thing cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 10 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves to paint and this is perfect. It travels well and can store some paints/brushes in the drawer. Folds down when not in use. She has used it more than her easel as she can sit at her desk and paint. Plus the drawer and easel part can lock so it won't open during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I wouldn't hurt my back and neck while drawing at my desk. So far it's worked perfectly! I love everything about it honestly! It stays up very well away every angle! It holds all my sketchbooks and canvases!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly well made for the price and a nice size. Everything fit well and worked, and while I think I would have preferred a clasp on both sides of the drawer, the single clasp is sufficient. the drawer is just large enough for a basic set of supplies and brushes, but not tall enough for everything to end up in a mess when you stand it up on its side. It fits nicely on my bike desk and lets me easily grab my kit for an impromptu walk or day trip.
customer_reviews.author: christie kahil

product_meta.title: Art Alternatives Marquis Artists Adjustable Desk Box Easel, Natural
product_meta.description: Color:BrownThe Marquis easel is a portable miniature desk that converts to a painting easel with one simple adjustment - and folds up just as easily. The folding easel adjusts to four positions and will accommodate a canvas up to 11x14 inches. Cleverly designed and light-weight yet sturdy, it has a drawer with three compartments to hold brushes, paints, sketching tools and other essential gear.
feature_bullets: A portable miniature desk that converts to a painting easel
An easel that adjusts to four different positions
Has a drawer with three compartments to hold brushes and other essential gear
Cleverly designed and light-weight yet sturdy
Accommodates canvas art and prints up to 11 x 14 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,806 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
